item.title: Testimonials for Services
item.dc:creator: ronalfy
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials for Keiter Mediation Services

We've received rave reviews from our clients.

Pam A M

Rob is a wonderful person to work with! He is very thorough, informative, and quick to respond to questions or concerns. I highly recommend him!

Scott Beyea

Rob Keiter is an excellent mediator that is very knowledgeable. I am a licensed attorney who took his course and have nothing but positives to say about this man and his dedication to ADR.

Schedule a Consultation Online

item.title: Training Testimonials
item.dc:creator: ronalfy
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials for Keiter Mediation Training

We've received rave reviews from our students.

Tia Ebarb Matt

Excellent and thoughtful mediation training. A very well-structured course. I feel more confident after learning from Rob!

Christina Billington

I have had several different types of mediation training courses over the years. Of all of them, I think Rob Keiter's family and divorce mediation training was the best!

Register for Online Training Today

item.title: Training Cards
item.dc:creator: ronalfy
item.content:encoded:
Available Online Mediation Training and Certifications

Here is a quick overview of our available courses. Click on each course to review certifications and continuous learning credits.

Register early for an early-bird discount.

Family And Divorce

Family and divorce mediators can take advantage of the growing public awareness of mediation as an effective alternative to divorce litigation.

View Class Schedule

Civil, Commercial, And Employment

Civil, Commercial, and Employment mediators help parties in dispute reach agreements that resolve their dispute.

View Class Schedule

Special Education Mediation

Special Education Mediation Training equips you to effectively resolve disputes between parents of children with disabilities and schools.

View Class Schedule

Workplace And Employment Mediation Training

Resolving Conflict in the Workplace Training is a three day course where participants learn how to mediate effectively to de-escalate and manage conflict in the workplace.

View Class Schedule

Advanced Mediation Training

Advanced Mediation Training builds upon basic mediation theory and practice.

View Class Schedule

Intro To Online Mediation

Intro to Online Mediation is designed for current mediators interested in learning how to mediate online.

View Class Schedule Register for Online Training Today
